name: playwrite
description: Playwright UI + API automation with POM, custom commands, Allure reporting, and CI scheduling.

scripts.test:ui:headed: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test tests/ui --headed
scripts.test:ui:headed:open: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test tests/ui --headed && npm run report:playwright
scripts.test:open-report: npm run test && npm run report:playwright
scripts.test:allure:open: npm run test:ci && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:ai: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test tests/ai/ai-demo.spec.ts --headed --workers=1
scripts.test:ai2: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test tests/ai/ai-gen1.spec.ts --headed --workers=1

author: Ahmet Demir
